page.title: 08STOVER GIRLS SCHOOL.
page.content: {Stover House}was built mid 1700's by James Templar who owned Haytor Granite Quarry.Today it is a girls private school and the present Headmistres is Mrs Linell.250 to 300 girls aged from 10 to 18 attend,120 are boarders . Average number per class is 16 and there are three houses Mary,Victoria and Elizabeth (named after Queens). Each house has a House Mistress,House Tutor and Matron who"live in".Parents of boarders live in other parts of England,America,Africa and Europe,many are in the forces.The school grounds cover 63 acres where Hockey,Lacrosse, Athletics and Cross Country ("Torture Field") are played.Other school activites include wind band,orchestra, sailing,riding,evening videos,Church, shopping trips and a weekly letter home for boarders.School motto,"In action faithful and in honour clear".
